reporter-output.line: <font color='orange'>Test Scenario : Launching the application</font>

-----Test Case 1-----
1. Install app and launch it.
2. Verify whether 'Login' screen is loaded.
STEP3
<font color='orange'>Test Scenario : Launching the application</font>

-----Test Case 2-----
1. Launch application.
2. Verify whether advertisement is shown.
3. Close the advertisement if it is shown, else continue execution.
<font color='black'>Info: Advertisement is shown.</font>
<font color='orange'>Test Scenario : Login</font>

-----Test Case 3-----
1. Enter correct Username
2. Enter correct password
3. Tap on login button.
STEP9
<font color='orange'>Test Scenario : Navigating to Analytics screen and tapping on Video 1, Video 2, Image and Article button.</font>

-----Test Case 4-----
1. Tap on Menu button
2. Tap on Article button.
3. Tap on Video 1 button.
3. Tap on Video 2 button.
3. Tap on Image button.
3. Tap on Article button.
STEP12
<font color='orange'>Test Scenario : Logout from the application.</font>

-----Test Case 4-----
1. Tap on Menu button
2. Tap on Logout button.
